subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The second-round leader Nick Flanagan birdied his final hole to join his fellow Australian Gavin Coles in first place at 11 under par after three rounds at the U.S. Bank Championship in Milwaukee. Kenny Perry, whose decided to play the tournament instead of the British Open, shot a third-round 69 to get to six under — too far back to have much of a chance at his fourth title this season.
